Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha SLT-A65 Camera
Reviews.Author: Clinton Carter
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and camera package.  The photos are clear and etc.  I was not certain if I should get the A77 or A65 but I am happy with the a65 choice that I made.  I've taken the camera on a couple of trips & for events and I'm able  to relive  these great memories thanks to the aid of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent package deal
Reviews.Author: MScott
Reviews.Content: This is a review of the Willoughby's package deal, not of the Sony A65.  If you want a review of the camera, better photographers than me have done so all over the internet.As far as I can tell, this is the best package deal available for the A65 with 18-55mm lens.All of the extras are of very high quality.The bag is a Sony brand camera bag that retails for $60.  It works great.The tripod/monopod is very sturdy and well constructed.  It normally sells for $35.The SD card is fast, and can hold about 600 RAW + Jpeg shots, or a couple thousand JPEG's.Between all of the different cleaning kits this came with, I have enough microfiber cloths to last me a lifetime.My favorite thing is probably the mini tripod, which is great for use on a tabletop.Everything came well packaged.I could not be happier with all of the extras in this kit.
